You defeated the dirty crown thief. However, frankly speaking, he was a formidable foe. Moreover, he couldn't exploit his full potential because of his stubbornness. While thinking for some time, Nagash decided to make him a Mortarch and even give him a proxy crown to control him.
Nagash performs a powerful ritual to absorb the souls of other factions and make their leaders his Mortarchs. Adding their armies to his growing forces of the undead.

Nagash, seeking to expand his dominion, declares war on the other undead faction. His goal is to use his powerful magic to absorb the souls of the defeated leaders and transforms them into his loyal Mortarchs, adding their armies to his unstoppable forces of the undead.
